title: we have champions that use water, fire, lightning, earth
body: but no wind?. we need THE LAST AIRBENDER!!!

replies.body: i knew i was missing one.

> [{quoted}](name=Spareatick,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=59mEmGwx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-22T19:58:42.758+0000)
>
> Janna though :(

thats a little different. Janna is more of a tornado bender. all of her abilities are based around tornados and storm and nothing as basic as wind attacks. if you know what I mean.
So because it is applied technique, it doesn't count?  And if you could control air element why would you want to use a stiff breeze over tornadoes for fighting?  Also, AAs and R.
her W is called zephyr which literally means a gentle breeze

?
We already have the Avatar of the Air. {{champion:40}}

if you are including lightning as a variation of fire as a requirement then you also need to include, metal and lava bending for earth and spirit bending.

EDIT: and blood bending (guess vlad covers it but it works quite differently)

> [{quoted}](name=Sona Ping,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=59mEmGwx,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-04-22T20:54:01.754+0000)
>
> "Did someone say Spirit Bending?" {{champion:420}}

I'm ashamed of myself now :(

I literally main her.

http://media-hearth.cursecdn.com/avatars/320/61/55473.gif

Don't worry. He bends ALL elementals.
